scripts.start: docker compose -p inlang-database --file ./supabase/docker/docker-compose.yml up -d && echo "waiting for database to initialize the schema..." && sleep 30 && npx prisma migrate dev && npm run apply-triggers && npm run apply-policies && npm run seed
scripts.create-migration: npx prisma migrate dev && npm run apply-triggers && npm run apply-policies && npm run seed
scripts.deploy-to-production: npx prisma generate && npx prisma migrate deploy && npm run apply-triggers && npm run apply-policies
